hero.title: Transform Your Business Communication Strategy
hero.subtitle: Unmi seamlessly integrates WhatsApp, SMS, and call management into one powerful platform.

features.title: Compare UNMI vs Chatbot
features.subtitle: Toggle between UNMI's automations and a full-fledged AI chatbot.

omnichannel.title: Omnichannel Messaging
omnichannel.description: Seamlessly manage WhatsApp, SMS, and voice calls from one unified dashboard, ensuring no customer inquiry goes unanswered.

routing.title: Intelligent Call Routing
routing.description: Our smart routing system ensures calls reach the right location or department, reducing missed opportunities and improving customer satisfaction.

autoResponse.title: Automated Responses
autoResponse.description: Instantly engage with customers even outside business hours with intelligent templates that provide the information they need.

analytics.title: Performance Analytics
analytics.description: Gain valuable insights with comprehensive analytics on call volumes, response times, and conversion rates to optimize your communication strategy.

multiLocation.title: Multi-Location Support
multiLocation.description: Easily manage multiple business locations from a single dashboard, with customized settings and reporting for each site.

revenueCalc.title: Revenue Calculator
revenueCalc.description: Our integrated calculator helps you track the direct financial impact of improved communication, showing the ROI of your Unmi investment.

engagement.title: Omni-Channel Engagement
engagement.description: Seamlessly manage conversations across WhatsApp and voice calls from one unified interface.

availability.title: 24/7 Availability
availability.description: Handle customer queries any time of day or night without manual intervention.

personalization.title: AI-Powered Personalization
personalization.description: Leverage AI to deliver tailored responses based on user context and history.

scalable.title: Scalable Architecture
scalable.description: Automatically scale to handle growing chat volumes without impacting performance.

analytics.title: Real-Time Analytics
analytics.description: Get instant insights on response times, user satisfaction, and resolution rates.

costCalc.title: Cost Efficiency Calculator
costCalc.description: Estimate your ROI and savings by automating chat workflows with our built-in calculator.

footer.text: Transform your business communication with our all-in-one platform.

choosePlan.title: Choose the Perfect Plan for Your Business
choosePlan.subtitle: Start with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required. Cancel anytime.

calculator.description: Estimate revenue generated by recovering calls

calculator.recommendation: With UNMI, businesses recover an average of 30-40% of missed calls, generating positive ROI from month one.

templates.title: Templates
templates.subtitle: Create and manage predefined messages for various situations
templates.firstTemplate: Create your first template to start automating responses

form.name: Template Name
form.contentPlaceholder: Hi! We saw you called but we couldn't answer...
form.tip: Include a clear call-to-action and a link to book or contact

actions.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. The template will be permanently deleted.

restrictedAccess.title: Restricted Access
restrictedAccess.subtitle: This feature is only available on the Templates plan
restrictedAccess.currentPlan: Your current plan does not include access to template management.
restrictedAccess.upgrade: Upgrade to Templates to create custom WhatsApp and SMS templates.

toast.templateCreatedDescription: The template has been created successfully
toast.templateDeletedDescription: The template has been deleted successfully

chatbots.title: Chatbots
chatbots.subtitle: Configure AI chatbots for automated 24/7 responses

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.desc: Select a chatbot provider, configure the API key, and UNMI will automatically route conversations. If the chatbot fails, the Templates system will be used as backup.

preview.title: Chatbot Preview
preview.subtitle: This is how your chatbot will look integrated in conversations
preview.placeholder: Your chatbot interface will be displayed here once configured

fallback.title: Backup System (Fallback)
fallback.subtitle: If the chatbot fails or is unavailable, this system will be used
fallback.conditions: UNMI will automatically use your Templates as backup if:
fallback.condition1: The chatbot doesn't respond within 5 seconds

config.title: Configure
config.subtitle: Connect your account with UNMI
config.apiKeyHelp: Get your API key from the panel. See documentation â†’
config.webhookHelp: URL where UNMI will send conversations for your chatbot to respond
config.fallbackHelp: Message that will be sent if the chatbot fails completely
config.note: When activating the chatbot, automatic Templates will be paused. They'll only be used as backup in case of error.

locations.title: Locations
locations.subtitle: Manage your business locations

form.name: Location Name

form.timezoneHelp: Used for scheduling messages and business hours

locations.firstLocation: Create your first location to start receiving and managing calls

nextStep.title: Next Step
nextStep.desc: You can now configure phone numbers for each location and start receiving calls. Templates and routing rules can be assigned per location.
